starts.title: Both players make silly faces at each other
starts.extra: Also, make strange noises

starts.title: Both players maintain 10 seconds of eye contact
starts.extra: ... with your foreheads almost touching

examples.title: Shake hands for 15 seconds
examples.extra: Switch to an overly formal two‑handed handshake and hold it for 10 more seconds

examples.title: Do an awkward slow clap
examples.extra: Stand up and slow clap together for 20 seconds while keeping eye contact

examples.title: Maintain eye contact for 30 seconds
examples.extra: Do it without smiling and inch closer until your noses nearly touch

examples.title: Give each other an awkward compliment
examples.extra: Deliver it in a formal monotone while maintaining eye contact

examples.title: Tell a goofy secret
examples.extra: Whisper it while keeping straight faces, then each share an even goofier one

examples.title: Pretend you just met on a bad date
examples.extra: Role‑play the first 30 seconds with forced small talk

starts.title: Start a sentence for the other player to finish
starts.extra: Also, make the sentence rhyme

starts.title: Pretend you are a mirror image of the other player
starts.extra: ... while the other player dances

examples.title: Improvise a 2‑line poem
examples.extra: Perform it as a dramatic whisper duet facing each other

examples.title: Invent a 5‑second handshake
examples.extra: Add one synchronized silly sound effect at the end

examples.title: Speak only in movie quotes
examples.extra: Hold a 4‑line conversation using only quotes

examples.title: Mime a short story together
examples.extra: Include a clear beginning and a dramatic ending pose

examples.title: Draw a picture in the air
examples.extra: Let the other trace it on your back with a fingertip

starts.title: Both players shake hands with each other
starts.extra: ... warmly, using both hands and eye contact

starts.title: Give each other a side-hug

examples.title: Give each other a shoulder squeeze
examples.extra: Follow with a slow 5‑count back pat

examples.title: Sit shoulder‑to‑shoulder
examples.extra: Lean lightly into each other for 15 seconds

examples.title: Side‑hug for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Make it 30 seconds while synchronizing your breathing

examples.title: Hold hands for a minute
examples.extra: Lean heads together while holding hands

examples.title: Hand massage for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Switch hands and add gentle thumb circles for 20 more seconds

examples.title: Full hug for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Extend to 20 seconds and sway gently

starts.title: Both players wink at each other dramatically
starts.extra: Also, compliment each other

starts.title: Both players take off their shoes
starts.extra: Also, invent a wacky handshake with your feet

examples.title: Strike a confident pose together
examples.extra: Hold it while making eye contact for 10 seconds

examples.title: Balance something together
examples.extra: Walk three steps without dropping it

examples.title: Do a dramatic entrance
examples.extra: Announce yourselves with names and a bold pose

examples.title: Speak a bold compliment
examples.extra: Lean in and whisper it directly in their ear

examples.title: Tell a flirty joke
examples.extra: Deliver a second joke from a step closer

examples.title: Try a short trust fall
examples.extra: Keep it brief and safe with a spotter; swap roles once

starts.title: Both players make yucky faces at each other
starts.extra: Also, make gross, nasty noises

starts.title: Both players touch their foreheads to the floor
starts.extra: ... and also sniff the floor

examples.title: Make a yucky face
examples.extra: Hold it for a photo‑worthy 10 seconds

examples.title: Name the worst smell you know
examples.extra: Describe it in vivid detail for 10 seconds

examples.title: Describe a gross food memory
examples.extra: Act it out with exaggerated sound effects

examples.title: Pretend to sniff something stinky
examples.extra: Agree on the source and 'find it' together

examples.title: Pretend to chew something awful
examples.extra: Make exaggerated faces and offer a 'sample' to the group

examples.title: Invent a nasty potion (no drinking)
examples.extra: Assemble pretend ingredients and give it a gross name

examples.title: Smell each other's socks (briefly)
examples.extra: Hold 3 inches away and do a single 3‑second whiff

starts.title: Both players stretch as high as they can
starts.extra: ... while jumping as high as they can

starts.title: The larger player will try to pick up the smaller
starts.extra: ... and carry them around the room

examples.title: Wall‑sit side‑by‑side for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Extend to 40 seconds if you can

examples.title: Do 10 jumping jacks together
examples.extra: Add 5 more in slow motion

examples.title: Plank and high‑five
examples.extra: Alternate left and right for 6 high‑fives total

examples.title: Race in place for 30 seconds
examples.extra: Finish with a deep breath in and a high‑five out

examples.title: Do a silly push‑up together
examples.extra: Sync three push‑ups and shout 'Together!' on the last one

starts.title: Both players stare at each other disdainfully

starts.extra: Also, mock the other player's disclosure

examples.title: Sing off‑key on purpose
examples.extra: Finish with a theatrical bow

examples.title: Describe your dorkiest outfit
examples.extra: Strike a mini runway pose to finish

examples.extra: Perform it like a dramatic reading for 10 seconds

examples.title: Maintain eye contact for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Try for 20 without laughing

starts.extra: Also, make immature noises
